ProductInfo.Features:
700TVL High Resolution Cameras with IR-Cut Built-in
Recording at 960H (960x480 pixels), HDMI port for high definition display
Instand email alert with photo if activity detected
When everyone else is asleep, our cameras are watching closely
The metal housing is designed for indoors & outdoors use
ProductInfo.Name: Zmodo Outdoor Security Camera System 8CH 960H Video DVR with 8x 700TVL High Resolution Day/Night IR-Cut Built-in Weatherproof Surveillance Cameras HDMI Port with 1TB Hard Drive
